name: Ready or Not (itch)
description: The main character with first person view (FPS) will start on the stairs after the exit ofthe room in which he wakes up. The first thing he finds is a firearm without ammunition,and as he progresses he encounters darkness and haze around it.In the mansion there are doors that lead to rooms that contain the puzzles, in totalthere will be 4, there is also a security room, which must be accessed if you avoid thezombies you find along the way.This room is accessed through a security code found on the body of the security manon the diagonal stairs to this room. After entering this room you will find ammunition andthe car key to leave the parking lot.The 4 puzzles must be solved in any order in order to open the emergency door thatleads to the parking lot of the mansion, where you must decide whether to escape to thecar or exterminate the zombie that protects the parking lot. The game ends when the maincharacter enters the car with the respective key.The Player has 100 health points, which will decrease from 15 to 15 as he is attackedby a zombie, the player only has 3 possibilities when encountering an enemy, fleeing.
